b'Bouken Shounen Shadar': b'When Earth is threatened by the invading Ghostar, a young boy with nerves of steel and the strength of 50 men appears from a cave on Mount Fuji. He is Shadar, a boy of unknown origin who, with his faithful dog, Pinboke, fights to save the world. \n\n(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia) '
